author: elecharny
msg: o Moved the attribute filtering from the AbstractBTreePartition class to SchemaInterceptor

o Fixed a huge issue that was introduced 7 years ago : when we were going through the ACI interceptor and doing a lookup, wth a standard user (not admin), then we were fetching the entry directly from the backend, instead of going through the whole chain
o Removed some filtering done in the OperationalAttributeInterceptor whil processing the Lookup Operation
